## ApiSchemaRouter() function

Creates a router that exposes [Agent](./core.agent.md) OpenAPI schema

**Signature:**

```typescript
ApiSchemaRouter: (options: ApiSchemaRouterOptions) => Router
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                | Description           |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| options   | [ApiSchemaRouterOptions](./remote-server.apischemarouteroptions.md) | Initialization option |

**Returns:**

Router

Expressjs router
